entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump President NOT A DOCTOR who was telling everyone to take a drug that killed people is now telling us the coronavirus will not come back as bad in the fall. (head shake). The virus was here in January. Trump was SO SO SO slow to contain it. Went around calling it a hoax for months
